API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.x trunk

sandy.core.data.Quaternion

type
class
version
3.1
since
0.3
The Quaternion class is experimental and not used in this version.

It is not used at the moment in the library, but should becomes very usefull soon.
It should be stable but any kind of comments/note about it will be appreciated.

<strong>ToDo</strong>: Check the use of and comment this class

Static Methods

lerp(startQ : Quaternion, endQ : Quaternion, fraction : Float) : Quaternion

parameters
startQ Beginning Quaternion
endQ Ending Quaternion
fraction Range from 0.0 to 1.0
returns
normalized intermediate Quaternion
Linear interpolation between a start and end Quaternion. Slightly faster, but less accurate, than slerp.

multiply(lq : Quaternion, rq : Quaternion) : Quaternion

parameters
lq Quaternion on the left in the expression
rq Quaternion on the right in the expression
Multiplies two Quaternions together. Quaternion multiplication is not commutative, that is q1 * q2 != q2 * q1

ofAxisAngle(axis : Point3D, angle : Float) : Quaternion

parameters
euler A point3d representing a an axis
angle Rotation angle in degrees
returns
A new Quaternion
Creates a new Quaternion from an axis and an angle in degrees

ofAxisRadians(axis : Point3D, radians : Float) : Quaternion

parameters
euler A point3d representing an axis
radians Rotation angle in radians
returns
A new Quaternion
Creates a new Quaternion from an axis and an angle in radians

ofEuler(euler : Point3D) : Quaternion

parameters
euler A point3d representing a euler rotation
returns
A new Quaternion
Creates a new Quaternion from a euler (pitch,yaw,roll) rotation in degrees

ofMatrix(m : Matrix4) : Quaternion

parameters
m Rotation matrix
returns
New Quaternion instance
Creates a new Quaternion from a rotation matrix

slerp(startQ : Quaternion, endQ : Quaternion, fraction : Float) : Quaternion

parameters
startQ Beginning Quaternion
endQ Ending Quaternion
fraction Range from 0.0 to 1.0
returns
normalized intermediate Quaternion
Sperical Linear interpolation between a start and end Quaternion.

Constructor

new(?px : Float, ?py : Float, ?pz : Float, ?pw : Float)
parameters
px X component of the vector
py Y component of the vector
pz Z component of the vector
pw Scalar component
Creates a quaternion.

Instance Variables

length(magnitude,null) : Float

The length, or magnitude, of the Quaternion

w : Float

x : Float

y : Float

z : Float

Instance Methods

add(q2 : Quaternion) : Void

parameters
q2 Quaternion to add to this Quaternion.
Adds a passed in Quaternion to this Quaternion. The result is not normalized.

clone() : Quaternion

returns
New Quaternion clone
Returns a copy of this Quaternion

conjugate() : Void

Conjugates this Quaternion. This negates the vector part of the Quaternion.

divide(q2 : Quaternion) : Void

parameters
q2 Quaternion to divide this Quaternion by.
Divides this Quaternion by a passed in Quaternion.

dotProduct(q : Quaternion) : Float

parameters
q Second Quaternion
returns
Float dot product
Calculate the dot product of this and another Quaternion

equal(q : Quaternion) : Bool

parameters
q Quaternion to compare to
returns
True if Quaternions are equal
Tests if this Quaternion is equal to another

getAxisAngle() : { axis : Point3D, angle : Float}

getAxisRadians() : { radians : Float, axis : Point3D}

getAxises() : sandy.TypedArray<Point3D>

returns
Array of Point3D vectors representing the axises
Returns the translation of the axises to world axises

getConjugate() : Quaternion

returns
The conjugate
Returns the conjugate of this Quaternion

getEuler() : Point3D

returns
Euler (pitch,yaw,roll) angles
Returns a Euler angles representing this Quaternion.

getInverse() : Quaternion

returns
New Quaternion which is the inverse of this
Returns an inverted copy of this Quaternion

getNorm() : Float

returns
flost normal
Returns the norm for this Quaternion

getPitch() : Float

returns
Pitch value in radians
Returns the pitch in radians. Yaw, pitch and roll values of a Quaternion are arbitrary compared to input.

getRoll() : Float

returns
Roll value in radians.
Returns the roll in radians. Yaw, pitch and roll values of a Quaternion are arbitrary compared to input.

getRotationMatrix() : Matrix4

returns
New Matrix4 representing the total rotaton of the Quaternion
Returns the 3x3 rotation matrix of this Quaternion.

getXAxis() : Point3D

returns
Point3D vector representing the local axis translated to world.
Returns translation to world of the local X axis vector.

getYAxis() : Point3D

returns
Point3D vector representing the local axis translated to world.
Returns translation to world of the local Y axis vector

getYaw() : Float

returns
Yaw value in radians.
Returns the Yaw (pan) in Radians. Yaw, pitch and roll values of a Quaternion are arbitrary compared to input.

getZAxis() : Point3D

returns
Point3D vector representing the local axis translated to world.
Returns translation to world of the local Z axis vector

identity() : Void

Sets this Quaternion to the multiplication identity. Quaternions have two identities, one for addition and one for multiplication.

identityAddition() : Void

Sets this Quaternion to the addition identity. Quaternions have two identities, one for addition and one for multiplication.

invert() : Void

Inverts the rotation

magnitude() : Float

returns
The magnitude (or length) of the Quaternion
The magnitude of this Quaternion

multiplyAsLeft(rq : Quaternion) : Void

parameters
rq Quaternion on the right hand side of the multiplication
Multiplies this Quaternion with another, modifying this Quaternion. This method is equivalent to this = this * rq. Quaternion multiplication is not commutative, so beware of order.

multiplyAsRight(lq : Quaternion) : Void

parameters
lq Quaternion on the left hand side of the multiplication
Multiplies this Quaternion with another, modifying this Quaternion. This method is equivalent to this = lq * this. Quaternion multiplication is not commutative, so beware of order.

multiplyVector(v : Point3D) : Point3D

normalize() : Void

Normalizes this Quaternion

scale(v : Float) : Void

parameters
v Scaling value
Scales the rotation angle of this Quaternion

setAxisAngle(axis : Point3D, angle : Float) : Void

parameters
axis Axis to rotate around
angle Angle in degrees
Sets the value of this Quaternion from an axis and angle.

setAxisRadians(axis : Point3D, radians : Float) : Void

parameters
axis Axis to rotate around
angle Angle in degrees
Sets the value of this Quaternion from an axis and angle.

setByEuler(euler : Point3D) : Void

parameters
euler set of pitch,yaw,roll angles in degrees
Set the Quaternion from a euler angle rotation

setByMatrix(m : Matrix4) : Void

parameters
m Rotation matrix
Sets the value of the Quaternion from a rotation matrix

subtract(q2 : Quaternion) : Void

parameters
q2 Quaternion to subtract from this Quaternion.
Subtracts a passed in Quaternion from this Quaternion. The result is not normalized.

toString() : String

returns
The string representatation
Returns a string representing this quaternion.
